import React from 'react' import Update from './update' import { useState} from "react"; import { Modal, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import './dash.css' export default function Dashp({movie,setData,data,delta,sub}) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const hiddenFileInput = React.useRef(null); const handleClick = event => { hiddenFileInput.current.click(); } return (
Add Movie




{Object.keys(movie).map((el) => (



{movie[el].title}

))}
) }
